actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that free or reduced cost parking spaces provided to Federal employees should continue to be provided free or at reduced cost.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that free or reduced rate parking spaces provided to Federal employees before October 1, 1979, should continue to be provided free or at reduced cost.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that free or reduced cost parking spaces provided to Federal employees should continue to be provided free or at reduced cost.
